=== XsltForms_xpathAxis Class === XML Constants Class for axes as an associative array
var XsltForms_xpathAxis = { ANCESTOR_OR_SELF: 'ancestor-or-self', ANCESTOR: 'ancestor', ATTRIBUTE: 'attribute', CHILD: 'child', DESCENDANT_OR_SELF: 'descendant-or-self', DESCENDANT: 'descendant', ENTRY: 'entry', FOLLOWING_SIBLING: 'following-sibling', FOLLOWING: 'following', NAMESPACE: 'namespace', PARENT: 'parent', PRECEDING_SIBLING: 'preceding-sibling', PRECEDING: 'preceding', SELF: 'self' };
